abstract: About one in every seven clicks on an advertisement is estimated to be fraudulent, and Microsoft is trying to make that kind of deception more expensive for perpetrators.
snippet: About one in every seven clicks on an advertisement is estimated to be fraudulent, and Microsoft is trying to make that kind of deception more expensive for perpetrators.
lead_paragraph: AFTER an investigation that took more than a year, Microsoft has filed its first lawsuit over click fraud, where people manipulate clicks on a Web advertisement.

headline.main: Microsoft Sues Three in Click-Fraud Scheme
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Sues Three In Click-Fraud Scheme
